channel.title: How to get worked the Easter Ring?
channel.description:
I would like to know this: When someone wear it, you become an egg.
Please, give me the code of this and where to put it exactly.
Thanks.

if (wearID == 7927) {
npcId = 3691;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}

item.title: How to get worked the Easter Ring?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 7927) { [i]npcId[/i] = 3691; [i]isNpc[/i] = [b]true[/b]; [i]updateRequred[/i] = [b]true[/b]; [i]appearanceUpdateRequired[/i] = [b]true[/b]; }

I love bolding and italicizing text, and adding colours

That should work.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get worked the Easter Ring?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:6, topic:289637”][quote author=dillingo link=topic=382835.msg2874808#msg2874808 date=1247982263]
Well I made it on my 317…
Heres the code I used.

[code] if ((playerItems[slot] - 1) == wearID) {
if (wearID == 7927) {
npcId = 3691;

Does this will work ? Also, where do I put this ? In client.java but where exactly ?
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]
[/quote][/quote]
You gotta learn to quote properly.
Yeah it goes in client.java, but I’m not gonna do everything for you. I gave you the command, now find the best place to put it in. You learn this way.

Read full topic
